snippet.title: Minecraft Trailer - Final Paradox - FULL CTM - ENGLISH DOWNLOAD
snippet.description:
It's finally here, the first release of RichMaps after the first Hispanic MapJam: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=8jIIBfccWdw
➣ SUPPORT RICHMAPS: https://www.patreon.com/RichMaps
➣ MAP DOWNLOAD:
https://www.minecraftforum.net/forums/mapping-and-modding-java-edition/maps/3166897-ctm-final-paradox-map-release-english-espanol-1

➣ VIDEO CREDITS: 
Edition: @luisb12022 
Production, screenwriting and recording: @ElRichMC &@luisb12022 
Voice acting: Phillip Freeman
Lettering: @misakibyakko 
Music: @carles_roch_music 
VFX: @CrAzYVFX 

➣ MORE INFORMATION:
In 2020, I made the wonderful decision of making a great CTM. I gathered some ideas and donated them to luisb1202 and DarthVid. They brought lots os additional content and a unique story. Years went by, and this map was born. After finishing it, betatesters made a great job. I recorded and uploaded my series, and proposed more content, changes and improvements... I wanted the map to have the highest quality possible, that's why I can assure you that the map download here is astonishingly better than the one you can see in my walkthrough. Today, let's take pride in the Hispanic community; we are in front of one of the best Minecraft maps ever created: Final Paradox. Not convinced? Perhaps you should download the map and judge yourself.

➣ ABOUT THE TRAILER:

Both Luis and me wanted this trailer to be much better than Sunset Dreams' trailer. We dedicated several weeks to work on it in order to pulish it as much as possible.

Luis' edition software crashed over 100 times while editing my footage from Replay Mod. Footage that took hundreds of attempts from my side. We have been really stressed; we invested so much time to bring this trailer to you... We honestly desire that you enjoy it as much as us.

➣  MIRROR DOWNLOAD:
FP: https://drive.google.com/file/d/1nvGY2vAqbHzguS2gL5MJoduNyq4YATvl
RP: https://drive.google.com/file/d/1JE68NpxAjwj3l2v9iyLwKiCHDAKMZUXB
(Only use this alternative download if the post download is not working)


➣ ¿Interesado en mis creaciones? ¡Abre la descripción y descubre que te estás perdiendo :P!
APOYA AL CANAL, Hazte miembro de ElRichMC y disfruta de un emblema y emoticonos en el canal: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCvnNkJsbONVhdXuHY_LpsdA/join
Sígueme en Twitter: https://twitter.com/ElRichMC
Sígueme en Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/elrichmcyt
Sígueme en Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/pg/ElRichMC-413996165668438
Suscríbete a mi canal de YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/subscription_center?add_user=elrichmc
¿Te gustan los directos? Suelo hacer directo cuando me apetece por las tardes aquí: https://www.twitch.tv/elrichmc

*¿No me conoces?*
Soy un jugador polivalente que ama este videojuego y hago todos los aportes que mi tiempo me permite para la comunidad. Te recomiendo ver estos vídeos para que me conozcas un poco más:

*MINECRAFT:*
- Survival: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=lvNYiD0zgeA
- E3 2020: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=eUrKeI33YQQ
- Reviews: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=hGkiLhWd99s
- Speedrun CTM: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=iC9g1wEPxWM
- Speedrun RSG: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ww33yHyJFqg
- UHC España: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=DpmPXEYYqe8
- EliteCraft: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=a6Ji5ZQx9GU
- Permadeath: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=aZSX5ik0Z6o
- No-Hit Minecraft: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Bj_8PxZ6IxM
- Mapas gratis: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=rRhNB19SExc
*OTROS JUEGOS:*
- Rayman Legends TOP 25: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=5WhrJPKfISY 
- The Binding of Isaac BILLONES DE DAÑO: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=y8EX3mmQplo
- Raid brutal en RUST: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=l77ix_Lsinw
